text: Asɨ 13.41 Mt 24.31, 25.31-46, Mk 13.27 hulaŋ iamɨgali likɨlɨci nudɨ lɨhu hɨvɨ hɨniavɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nulɨdɨ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ agɨladɨ mɨŋaihuihu lɨhavɨlalɨ uami. Mufɨli Hulaŋ dɨ Ninaŋ agaŋ nudɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ abɨci nulɨdɨ likɨlavɨbali uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali ciaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lulavɨlalɨ agɨladɨ avi likɨlavɨbali uami.
